sentences.sContent: I anticipate nothing but grateful approbation .
sentences.sCn: 我预料大家只有感激赞许。

sentences.sContent: Julian Lloyd Webber thinks his brother would like the approbation of serious critics.
sentences.sContent_eng: Julian Lloyd Webber thinks his brother would like the approbation of serious critics.
sentences.sCn: 朱利安·劳埃德·韦伯认为他弟弟希望获得严肃批评家的认可。

remMethod.val: ap + prob(=prove证实) + ation → 证实是好的 → 赞许
